Sentencas: In this work it was shown that the crystallite size of fully dense nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia (ZrO2 center dot Y2O3) can be reduced substantially by alumina doping.
Titulo: Grain size reduction in fully dense nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia by Al doping

Sentencas: This could improve the oxygen transport properties and give rise to many technical applications, such as in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Grain size reduction in fully dense nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia by Al doping

Sentencas: It has been recently shown that the oxygen diffusivity in the grain boundaries of nanocrystalline ZrO2 center dot Y2O3 is strongly enhanced compared to the volume diffusivity.
Titulo: Grain size reduction in fully dense nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia by Al doping

Sentencas: The present experiments show that the diffusion constant in alumina-doped n-ZrO2 center dot Y2O3 is reduced compared to that of undoped n-ZrO2 center dot Y2O3.
Titulo: Grain size reduction in fully dense nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia by Al doping
